title: FOCUS: G-20 finance chief meeting to highlight rift, not post-pandemic unity - Kyodo News Plus
content: FOCUS: G-20 finance chief meeting to highlight rift, not post-pandemic unity  Kyodo News Plus
description: Finance chiefs of the Group of 20 major economies will likely do little more than highlight the deep rift that has formed among member nations next week when the forum holds its first ministerial-level meeting since Russia's invasion of Ukraine.
